body:
Pardon me for bumping into this old thread, this was the only I could find regarding Revit.

I'm looking for a plugin for my workflow (all models done in Revit, import to GH -> simulate ->make changes in Revit -> import again -> Simulate, etc.).



I've checked the videos of the plugins from this group ([http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/gh-revit](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/gh-revit)), also checked Mantis Shrimp. 

They look promising but they seem geared for those who know how to model in Rhino/GH (I don't).



[CASE](http://www.case-inc.com/) in particular seems plausible but when I checked the videos, it didn't export the walls, doors. Is there a workaround for this?
